"About this Quest":
"This quest will clear automatically when the time limit is reached.

Also, when your acquired Quest Points are above a certain level, rare and boosted enemies are more likely to appear.

Work hard alongside your fellow ARKS to defeat as many enemies as you can within the time limit!"

"If you are wearing specific costumes or layered wear, you can receive the effect of the \"Costume Bonus\" PSE.
\"Costume Bonus\" increases your rare drop rate and the amount of EXP you earn.
For details on which costumes this PSE applies to, please check bumped.org.

â€»The PSE effect is limited to this quest, and if you switch to a non-applicable costume while the PSE is active, it will cease to apply to you."

"In this quest, you cannot receive the items dropped by enemies until you clear the quest.

When the time limit is reached and the quest clears, you can collect all dropped items from the transfer destination area."
